Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory668.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark', 3: 'Are you really going to go with my work?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Why not? You don't care what they have to say about it, right?", 3: '6'}
{2: 'Mark', 3: "Right, I don't... except getting them to care about it is the whole point of this mission here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A makeshift tent billows with shrieks in the wind on the spacious Windmill Square.'}
{3: "The chills outside the tent, however, put absolutely no dent in the heated discussion inside it on what's going to happen next."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Can someone just explain to me what in the world is going on here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "We're all set, Commandant... Hey, what's that for, Teddy?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Outta my way. Teddy coming through... Here, Commandant. This is the letter you asked me to write.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Is it provocative enough?', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I did pick a part from a past conversation with Karenina as you told me to... and it's something you want to steer clear of when you aren't feeling your best.", 4: '2'}
{2: '...Sounds perfect. Get ready to send it off, then.', 3: '23'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'All completed works have arrived, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Put them where they're supposed to go.", 3: '27'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Roger that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Any update from you, Lee?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Having not the least trouble traveling through Constellia's city network, all thanks to Dulcinea's admin privilege.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We have our hands on the whereabouts of all the members from Master-class from all three schools. Will send them your way now, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Fifteen minutes out...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thanks, Vera. Hang in there.', 3: '37'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "C'mon, I was only back for a few seconds and you went ahead and put me out here. You do know that there is a steep price to pay, don't you?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: '...Your contribution shall not be forgotten, Vera.', 3: '41'}
{2: "How's everything with the mechanoids?", 3: '42'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Right behind me looking like a bunch of puppies trying to get their stolen bones back.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'What have you done to them...'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Fourteen minutes out. Time to get them to go to where we want them to go now.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Alrighty. Let's make it hot and epic.", 3: '46'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You look over at Teddy and give her the green light.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Sent. Oh boy, this is going to be absolutely epic...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Oh wow, there's the reply. Mechanoids never waste a second, huh?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Challenge accepted, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Challenging all three schools from the Palette Clash to a showdown on behalf of the Neo-Multidimensional Mechanical Cubists—this is probably about as crazy as crazy can get.'}
{3: 'Right then, Dulcinea walks in on the discussion.'}
{2: 'Dulcinea, why are you...', 3: '61'}
{3: 'With the halo over her head gone, Dulcinea now looks like any regular mechanoid—just like how you remember her when you first met.'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'I was just thinking about the conversation we had, where you guys told me to stop them as who I am.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'So... here I am now.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Best of luck with it, Dulcinea.', 3: '69'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'We got your back, Dulcin.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark', 3: 'Show them how you roll, Boss.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Tell them exactly what you want to tell them.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I already sent you the instructions for the devices.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "By the way... Do I get to play with your admin privilege when we're done?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Never mind. I never said that.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Ten minutes out.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Let's get ready for what we need to do next.", 3: '90'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: "It's time to put an end to the Palette Clash."}
